lead_paragraph: Two people were killed and at least 68 were injured on Wednesday in a series of collisions involving about 100 vehicles on an icy bridge near Incheon International Airport, officials said.

headline.main: South Korea: Two People Die in Collisions on Bridge
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Two People Die in Collisions on Bridge

snippet: Two people were killed and at least 68 were injured on Wednesday in a series of collisions involving about 100 vehicles on an icy bridge near Incheon International Airport, officials said.
